abstract: A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of specific exposure and ISO values.
overview:
## Overview

The `AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings` class is a concrete subclass of the `AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings` class used when bracketing exposure duration and ISO.

An `AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings` instance defines exposure duration and ISO settings that should be applied to one image in a bracket. An array of `AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings` objects is passed to `captureStillImageBracketAsynchronouslyFromConnection:withSettingsArray:completionHandler:` to specify the bracketing.

You can query the minimum and maximum duration and ISO properties of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance supplying data to an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] instance. If you wish to leave [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings/exposureDuration] unchanged for this bracketed still image, you pass the value `AVCaptureExposureDurationCurrent` when creating the instance. To keep the ISO unchanged, you pass `AVCaptureISOCurrent` when creating the instance.

# AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings

**Class**

A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of specific exposure and ISO values.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings
```

## Overview

The `AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings` class is a concrete subclass of the `AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings` class used when bracketing exposure duration and ISO.

An `AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings` instance defines exposure duration and ISO settings that should be applied to one image in a bracket. An array of `AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings` objects is passed to `captureStillImageBracketAsynchronouslyFromConnection:withSettingsArray:completionHandler:` to specify the bracketing.

You can query the minimum and maximum duration and ISO properties of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance supplying data to an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] instance. If you wish to leave [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings/exposureDuration] unchanged for this bracketed still image, you pass the value `AVCaptureExposureDurationCurrent` when creating the instance. To keep the ISO unchanged, you pass `AVCaptureISOCurrent` when creating the instance.

## Creating a manual bracketed exposure settings instance

- **manualExposureSettings(exposureDuration:iso:)**: Creates a configuration of still image settings using the specified exposure duration and ISO.

## Getting manual exposure setting values

- **iso**: The ISO for the still image.
- **exposureDuration**: The exposure duration for the still image.

## Bracketed settings types

- **AVCaptureAutoExposureBracketedStillImageSettings**: A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of bias relative to automatic exposure.
- **AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings**: The abstract superclass for bracketed photo capture settings.

## Inherits From

- AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
